title: Lahmentabla
author: Lahmentabla
created_time: May 18, 2023, 01:50:47 PMLast edit: May 18, 2023, 07:37:36 PM by Lahmentabla
content: ⚡️Arkham Platform⚡️Let's get straight to the point✅ Named by one of the world's largest crypto news portals, CoinDesk, as one of the projects to follow in 2023, in their report where they track projects that solve real-world problems.:✅ A revolutionary way to follow ANY TYPE of information you need ONCHAIN across different distributed cryptographic technologies such as blockchain, where you can literally do EVERYTHING with data, track movements from origin to end, data for trading, relationships between accounts, with exchanges, interactions with DEX, etc: ✅ I'm neither a trader, nor am I interested in ONCHAIN information to verify tokens, nor to get any kind of relevant information that I can get from there. Am I economically interested?. Yes, indeed. To give you a real use case, Justin Tsun recently declared that he's going to pump meme coins to donate the profits to charity. With Arkham platform, you can track the tokens he's buying with one of his accounts and literally do the same thing as him. But the potential uses are endless: Yes, indeed. To give you a real use case, Justin Tsun recently declared that he's going to pump meme coins to donate the profits to charity. With Arkham platform, you can track the tokens he's buying with one of his accounts and literally do the same thing as him. But the potential uses are endless.✅ That's all great with the numbers and dashboards. But what have these guys done that's disruptive in the world of information security that might make their token interesting to me? Have you heard of the Alameda Research case that made headlines around the world or the BTC fluctuations due to the false token sales signal from the U.S.? Arkham Intelligence blew the whistle on both cases. That's how relevant the technology they use is.✅ Who has invested money in this company? They raised $10 million in initial funding from:Palantir founders (CIA/Pentagon contractor),OpenAI founders (chatGPT),Geoff Lewis at Bedrock Capital,Tim Drapper✅ What is the token called and when does it launch? The token is called $ARKM. The TGE has not yet been confirmed but anticipation is high and they will distribute tokens to people who join the waitlist to test the alpha and complete certain tasks.✅ Let's recap [-REAL and DISRUPTIVE uses-LAUNCH TOKEN soon ($ARKM) and will distribute to people who join the waitlist and complete tasks-Top investors-Technology from the company that uncovered the Alameda Research case✅  JOIN the waitlist[Click]Join ARKHAM's waitlist [Click]*The link carries a referral, you can find the same link on the web without referral.Links:https://twitter.com/arkhamintelhttps:///arkhamintelligencehttps://platform.arkhamintelligence.com/[/list]

comments.body: Arkham project made huge partnerships in very less time. Binance announced official Arkham token ARKM sale in their launchpad.
